sections.heading: lands; sale; public auction required
sections.text: No lands now owned or hereafter acquired by the state for educational purposes shall be sold except at public auction.SourceLaws 1921, c. 80, § 2, p. 290;C.S.1922, § 5191;Laws 1923, c. 61, § 1, p. 185;Laws 1925, c. 135, § 1, p. 354;Laws 1929, c. 188, § 1, p. 652;
